summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York forwarding an FBI report from the Epstein tip line to colleagues, noting its relevance to the MCC guards case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Sender of the email who is sharing an FBI report from the Epstein tip line with colleagues in connection with the MCC guards case.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: Jurisdiction of the prosecutor sending the email.

locations.name: New York, NY 10007
locations.context: Address associated with the prosecutor's office.

keyFacts: An FBI report from the Epstein tip line was shared by a prosecutor in November 2020.
The report was considered relevant to the MCC guards case.
The email indicates ongoing review and sharing of investigative materials related to Epstein.
